flawed_nl_solution:
900 x 3/4 = <<900*3/4=675>>675 people came before the start of the concert.
900 - 675 = <<900-675=252>>252 people did not come before the start of the concert.
252 x 5/9 = <<252*5/9=140>>140 people came few minutes after the first song.
So, 140 + 80 = <<140+80=220>>220 people came to the concert that was not able to be at the start of the concert.
Therefore, 252 - 220 = <<252-220=32>>32 people did not go to the concert.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 225.0, not 252.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
